mapper.insert: insert into umrole (ROLEID, ROLENAME, SYSCODE, CREATOR, PARENTIDS, MEMO, SHOWORDER, ORGRANGE, ROLECODE, FRAMESETID, BASEROLE, ISDEFAULT, del_flag) values (#{roleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rolename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{syscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showorder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{orgrange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rolecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{framesetid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{baserole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdefault,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update umrole set ROLENAME = #{rolename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSCODE = #{syscode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENTIDS = #{parentids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOWORDER = #{showorder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ORGRANGE = #{orgrange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROLECODE = #{rolecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRAMESETID = #{framesetid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BASEROLE = #{baserole,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ISDEFAULT = #{isdefault,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where ROLEID = #{roleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ROLEID, ROLENAME, SYSCODE, CREATOR, PARENTIDS, MEMO, SHOWORDER, ORGRANGE, ROLECODE, FRAMESETID, BASEROLE, ISDEFAULT, del_flag from umrole where ROLEID = #{roleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ROLEID, ROLENAME, SYSCODE, CREATOR, PARENTIDS, MEMO, SHOWORDER, ORGRANGE, ROLECODE, FRAMESETID, BASEROLE, ISDEFAULT, del_flag from umrole
